body: This release cuts out the end part of the name for each girl, download this re-upload instead that shows the full name for each girl instead of cutting off the end part of their names: https://nhentai.net/g/251091/

@Mr_Anon did you just look at the cover and comment before looking at the tags or even look through all the pages? This entry feature 7 other AL ship girls as well as Illustrious and Unicorn for a total of 9 characters. Each character got 4 pages there was no favoritism for Illustrious and Unicorn here so I really don't know what your complaining about since this basically fulfilled your request. On a different note it was a real treat getting Graf Zeppelin drawn by Oyari Ashiro in this. Though I would've liked her to look a bit more serious (thats kinda her thing) and Queen Elizabeth and Hammann were also not giving off any of their respective trademark himedere and Tsundere vibes. Still with Oyari Ashiro behind the wheel with the art I'll forgive such oversights.
What does C93 mean? Or all of those? -uneducated noob

Wish Oyari Ashito would focus on other girls instead of Illustrious & Unicorn. Not that I hate them, but he already made a book about them in C93 & there's plenty other sexy ships. I guess they must be his waifus
